thread.title: Regular London trip
thread.title_full: Regular London trip - Review of Apex Temple Court Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ian H
title: Regular London trip
text:
Great location for the real London with good access to Law Courts,City,Covent Garden,and of course the historical areas associated with The Law and The Press
Very quiet at weekends.
St Brides Church really worth a visit
Great on a Monday morning with the return to work buzzing
Bur all the excitment of a busy commercial lo
